alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 31 at 5:35PM MDT until April 02 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Periods of strong gusty winds. West winds 25 to 45 mph with brief gusts around 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Northern and central Carbon County, northern Albany County, and Converse County. * WHEN...Saturday morning through noon Sunday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin
